title: Southeast Asia gaming revenue share 2013 - 2017 , by country
summary: Overall Indonesia, and Philippines are gradually increasing, Malaysia, and Singapore are gradually decreasing, Thailand, Vietnam, and Rest of SEA are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
